name: Shooting pirate ships in Lala land?
name_original: Shooting pirate ships in Lala land?
description:
Here is a version of shooting pirate ships

The ships are from Kenny: https://www.kenney.nl/

font is from : https://www.dafont.com/daniel-davis.font

and the music is from: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/search/game/

The whole game is based on a tutorial provided by gamedev.tv.
